timeline.bodyText: I would say A living entity is valid when the living entity is alive.
timeline.author: YanisBft
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,11 +1,38 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_1301 net/minecraft/predicate/entity/EntityPredicates FIELD field_22280 EXCEPT_CREATIVE_SPECTATOR_OR_PEACEFUL Ljava/util/function/Predicate; FIELD field_6152 VALID_INVENTORIES Ljava/util/function/Predicate; + COMMENT Tests if an entity has a valid inventory. + COMMENT + COMMENT

An entity has a valid inventory when: + COMMENT + COMMENT

  • The entity is alive + COMMENT
  • The entity is an {@link java.lang.Class#isAssignableFrom(Class) instanceof} {@link net.minecraft.inventory.Inventory} + COMMENT
+ COMMENT + COMMENT @see net.minecraft.entity.vehicle.StorageMinecartEntity FIELD field_6153 NOT_MOUNTED Ljava/util/function/Predicate; + COMMENT Tests if an entity is not mounted. + COMMENT + COMMENT

An entity is not mounted when: + COMMENT + COMMENT

  • The entity is alive + COMMENT
  • The entity has no passengers + COMMENT
  • The entity is not in a vehicle + COMMENT
FIELD field_6154 VALID_ENTITY Ljava/util/function/Predicate; + COMMENT Tests if an entity is valid. + COMMENT + COMMENT

An entity is valid when the entity is alive. + COMMENT + COMMENT @see net.minecraft.entity.Entity#isAlive() FIELD field_6155 EXCEPT_SPECTATOR Ljava/util/function/Predicate; FIELD field_6156 EXCEPT_CREATIVE_OR_SPECTATOR Ljava/util/function/Predicate; FIELD field_6157 VALID_ENTITY_LIVING Ljava/util/function/Predicate; + COMMENT Tests if a living entity is valid. + COMMENT + COMMENT

A valid living entity must be entity is alive.

replies.bodyText: lol apparently I brainfarted my grammar there
replies.author: i509VCB

timeline.author: liach

timeline.bodyText: This field deserves a rename to VALID_LIVING_ENTITY
timeline.author: liach
